summary: The diff appears to implement the Travelogue “Map” button, wires a new TraveloguePanel callback into LocationMapExplorer, and updates MapComponent to accept and render journey schedule items on the existing 2D map. However, due to truncation, some acceptance-criteria details (exact button placement/label and the user-visible error behavior when some locations cannot be mapped) are not fully verifiable from the provided excerpts.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new button labeled exactly "Map" with a 2D/map-style icon, positioned next to the existing "Flying" button in the Travelogue journey action row.
missing_requirements.reason: TraveloguePanel shows the new Map icon import and an onMapJourney prop, but the diff excerpt is truncated before showing the actual action-row JSX, so exact label text ("Map") and placement next to the existing "Flying" button cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: If one or more schedule items cannot be mapped to coordinates, the app does not crash and shows a user-visible error/toast indicating some locations could not be displayed.
missing_requirements.reason: The LocationMapExplorer excerpt is truncated before showing the handleMapJourney implementation and any partial-failure handling. The file summary mentions toast usage, but the exact behavior for partial mapping failures cannot be verified from code excerpts.
